# `math arctanh` for [math](/commands/categories/math.md)

<div class='command-title'>Returns the inverse of the hyperbolic tangent function.</div>

## Signature

```> math arctanh {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output      |
| ------------ | ----------- |
| list\<number\> | list\<float\> |
| number       | float       |
## Examples

Get the arctanh of 1
```nu
> 1 | math arctanh
inf
```
